__e: Well, Dante didn't steal for money or attention, he stole to help his mother.
Enough to know that I cannot trust you either, just like Dante couldn't.
Maybe he could tell us that Dante wasn't with him, and we will have done our due diligence.
Not yet, but I might once I get into Dante's office and take a look at the crime scene.
We had to show Dante and the whole neighborhood how we felt about him running around saying he was innocent, and we did it real public-like with a real bat.

Well, after how things ended I wanted to do something nice for you. But Dante and I got to talking, and, I mean, thanks to you I knew everything about him-- his love of paninis, his interest in clean coal technology, his Fijian outreach program.
